wikipedia_page.main: Kirk Zavieh (born 1 April 1968) is a British fencer. He competed in the individual and team sabre events at the 1992 Summer Olympics.He is also the composer, alongside Charles Hodgkinson, of the Sky News music theme, performed by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1992 Summer Olympics
response: * Kirk Zavieh, Ian Williams, Gary Fletcher, James Williams, Amin Zahir

He has also written music for BBC World Service and for radio and television in the UK and elsewhere, including the orchestration of the Sky News HD music theme (originally composed by Kirk Zavieh and Charles Hodgkinson) and the current LBC and Smooth Radio network jingles.
